QuestData.Title: Journey to Undercity
QuestData.Description: This is quite extraordinary! It appears to be a gift to Lady Sylvanas Windrunner from her sister, Alleria!$B$BYou must take it to her in the Undercity at once! The lady holds court in the Royal Quarter.$B$BTo get there, use the orb of translocation in the Inner Sanctum of Sunfury Spire in Silvermoon City to cross over to the Undercity. Once there, take the elevator ride down into the city proper. Use your maps if you need help finding the Royal Quarter.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take The Lady's Necklace to Lady Sylvanas Windrunner at the Royal Quarter in Undercity.
